content.rendered:
Directed by Abhay Chopra.

Written by Abhay Chopra. Shreyas Jain. Nikhil Mehrotra.

Cast Sidharth Malhotra(Vikram Sethi). Sonakshi Sinha(Maya Sinha). Akshaye Khanna(Dev Verma). Mandira Bedi(Gayatri Verma). Himanshu Kohli(Insp. Gautam Kohli). Ajay Jadhav(Hawaldar Suresh Tambe). Pavail Gulati(Chirag). Sameer Sharma(Shekhar Sinha (as Samir Sharma)). Kimberley Louisa McBeath(Katherine Sethi (as Kimberley McBeath)). Vinay Sharma(Insp. Kadam). Romil Saraswat(Police Commissioner (as Romil)). Bharat Jha(Mr. Kawadkar). Trupti Khamkar(Mrs. Kawadkar (as Trupti Kamkar)). Jeetu Shastri(Old Man (as Jitendra Shastri)). Sanyukta Timsina(Sandhya – Old Man’s Daughter). Sandesh Upashyam(Constable Gawde). Sujata Jog(Maya’s Maid). Arpit Sharma(Analyst at Forensic Lab). Subah Kapur(Attendant at Evidence Room). Hitesh Arora(Local Detective). Lalit Jha(Day-time Security Guard). Godaan Kumar(Night-time Security Guard). Raj Kishore Rana(Watchman at 2nd Building). Mohan Nandha(Lallan (uncredited)). Rishabh Nigam(Shravan (uncredited)). Pravin(Dande (uncredited)). Ratishankar Tripathi(Interrogation Cop at Night (uncredited)). Shankar Yadav((uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Juno Chopra. Kapil Chopra. Renu Chopra. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Madhav Roy Kapur. Gauri Khan. Satish Mane. Karim Morani. Iqbal Siddiqui. Gaurav Verma.

Production Red Chillies Entertainment. Dharma Productions. B.R. Studios.
